DataElement.preferredName: Observation Performed Study Activity Identifier OMOP CDM Condition Occurrence Identifier
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active._One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing._A unique identifier for each Condition Occurrence event.

Concepts.definition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.
Executed and carried through to completion.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.
